name: Last Wheel on Earth
description:
You are Creamy McStuvins: unicycler extraordinaire. Just because it's the apocalypse, doesn't mean you can't have a little fun right? Freewheel your way through seven harrowing levels achieve ultimate cycling freedom!

  • A and D to pedal
  • W to extend
  • R to restart level
  • Have fun!

Last Wheel on Earth was made in 48 hours for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2020.  The theme for this jam was "Out of Control"
